Question.Subject: help needed with twitter.?
Question.Content: can i reply to a person in twitter, whom i am following but hes not following me back? will he get to know about it? how will he get my mssg when hes not following me back? as we reply by - @username iam not talking about direct messages. but i created 2 accnts and i replied to one by - @username and i loged in to check if i got the message but i didnt recieved any reply.
Question.ChosenAnswer: He will still get it. In order to see your @ messages you have to click the @YourUserName in your right sidebar. If you click there you will see the one you sent to yourself.

Answer.Content: yes, he will recieve your @ replies even if you arent following each other
